response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its value to you and the cost to me. I am confident this investment will pay off in the long run. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making a purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
